welcome_message_body: Welcome to Karawang, a charming city known for its rich cultural heritage, beautiful landscapes, and vibrant local traditions. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the unique experiences that this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Sop Janda
restaurants.description: Sop Janda is a soup spot located in Karawang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Mangga No. 1A (Depan Kantor Pemda Karawang), Karawang, Jawa Barat 41312

restaurants.name: Ayam Bakar Taliwang 01 Pak HASAN
restaurants.description: Ayam Bakar Taliwang 01 Pak HASAN is a halal restaurant located in Karawang.
restaurants.address: Pasar Bersih Galuh Mas (Raya Galuh Mas), Karawang, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: J.Co Donuts & Coffee
restaurants.description: J.Co Donuts & Coffee is a donut shop located in Karawang.
restaurants.address: Karawang Central Plaza (Jl. Galuh Mas), Karawang, Jawa Barat 41361

restaurants.name: RM Soto Gempol Raya
restaurants.description: RM Soto Gempol Raya is a soup spot located in Karawang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Rangga Gede No. 33 Krw, Karawang, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: BREWBEAN Coffee House
restaurants.description: BREWBEAN Coffee House is a café located in Karawang.
